member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.ICanvasBrush
member.summary: A brush defines the color of things being drawn. It can be a solid color, or a bitmap pattern, or a gradient.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.ICanvasBrush.Transform
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush transform matrix.

remarks.p: To align the content of an bitmap brush to the area being painted, you can use the Transform property to translate the bitmap to the desired location. This transform only affects the brush; it does not affect any other content drawn by the render target.
